tool_description: 🪄 Provides easy&fast access to text2image / image2image / inpainting AI. (57 models across Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x and finetuned models)
title: Dezgo

api_list.name: /upscale
api_list.description:
Upscale an image by a factor of 2
This AI attempts to preserve contrasted edges and details as much as possible, producing a sharper image than simple interpolation methods. The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `image`
(see the "About" section for more details)

parameters.name: image
parameters.description:
The image to upscale

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 2048` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

api_list.name: /image2image
api_list.description:
Edit an existing image to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
  - `double_exposure_diffusion`
  - `dreamshaper`
  - `duchaiten_anime`
  - `duchaiten_darkside`
  - `duchaiten_dreamworld`
  - `eimis_anime_diffusion_1`
  - `ely_orange_mix`
  - `emoji_diffusion`
  - `epic_diffusion_1`
  - `epic_diffusion_1_1`
  - `foto_assisted_diffusion`
  - `future_diffusion`
  - `hasdx`
  - `iconsmi_appiconsmodelforsd`
  - `inkpunk_diffusion`
  - `lowpoly_world`
  - `openjourney`
  - `openjourney_2`
  - `openniji`
  - `paint_journey_2_768px`
  - `papercut`
  - `pastel_mix`
  - `portrait_plus`
  - `realistic_vision_1_3`
  - `redshift_diffusion`
  - `redshift_diffusion_768px`
  - `something_2`
  - `stable_diffusion_fluidart`
  - `stable_diffusion_papercut`
  - `stable_diffusion_voxelart`
  - `stablediffusion_1_4`
  - `stablediffusion_1_5`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_768px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_768px`
  - `steampunk_diffusion`
  - `synthwavepunk_v2`
  - `texture_diffusion`
  - `trinart_2_0`
  - `tshirt_diffusion`
  - `vectorartz_diffusion`
  - `vintedois_diffusion_v0_1`
  - `vox_2`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_3`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_4`
parameters.default: epic_diffusion_1_1

parameters.name: strength
parameters.description:
How strongly the original image should be altered (from subtle to drastic changes)
From 0.0 to 1.0

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 1`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

api_list.name: /inpainting
api_list.description:
Modify a part of an image (using a mask) to fit a given text description


The following parameters influence the request cost: `init_image`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Images must be of the same size: `init_image` and `mask_image`

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: mask_image
parameters.description:
A black and white mask that defines the parts of the image to modify.
Should be the same size as init_image.

White pixels = modified ; Black pixels = unchanged

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: images must be of the same size

parameters.name: init_image
parameters.description:
Upload the original image to be modified.
Supports PNG/JPEG files, up to a maximum of 1024x1024. Dimensions should be divisible by 8. The image is resized automatically if necessary.

**Constraints:**
- Image size: `8 - 1024` pixels on either side (auto-resized)

constraints.conditional: mask_image, init_image: images must be of the same size

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_1`
  - `stablediffusion_inpaint_2`
parameters.default: stablediffusion_inpaint_1

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

api_list.name: /text2image
api_list.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.

  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**

parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**

  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`

api_list.name: /info
api_list.description: Get information about the Dezgo API (such as available models).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dezgo.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dezgo.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

id.description: Unique identifier of the model (used to specify the model in the API)

name.description: Human readable name of the model

triggers.description:
If set, indicates that the model was trained to react to these specific trigger prompts (for example with Dreambooth finetuning).
Prepend your prompt with one of these triggers to use this model's specific behavior.

functions.description: The set of functions that this model can perform.

description.description: Human readable description of the model

paymentMethods.description: Information about the available payment methods

schema.description: Describe global information about the Dezgo API.

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`
parameters.default: euler_a

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
